data.title: Newest Line of Semi Truck Models
data.meta_description: Find the newest line of semi truck models here: from carrying timber to traversing city traffic, the Volvo Truck Lineup has the perfect fit for every haul.
data.text:
https://www.volvotrucks.us/trucks/all-new-vnl/

All-new Volvo VNL – Long-haul

The all-new Volvo VNL is completely reimagined inside and out to be our safest, most connected, and most fuel-efficient truck yet. Once again, we are leading the industry with the truck designed to change everything.

Explore

Build Your VNL

https://www.volvotrucks.us/trucks/vnl/

VNL Series – Long-haul

The Volvo VNL is built for the needs of today’s—and tomorrow’s—long-haul trucking operations. The VNL delivers long-haul efficiency, along with premium comfort and amenities.

Explore

Build Your VNL

https://www.volvotrucks.us/trucks/vnr-electric/

VNR Electric Series

Our constant drive to innovate has made us the global leader in electromobility for Class 8 vehicles. The VNR Electric is proof of our commitment to reduce pollution, noise, and traffic on crowded urban streets.

Explore

https://main--vg-volvotrucks-us--hlxsites.hlx.page/trucks/vnr/

VNR Series – Regional

The Volvo VNR represents the future of regional haul. This truck does not compromise, delivering productivity and efficiency with quality and long-haul amenities.

Explore

Build Your VNR

https://www.volvotrucks.us/trucks/vnx/

VNX Series – Heavy Haul

The Volvo VNX is built specifically for the needs of heavy-haul trucking operations. The VNX provides the power and performance demanded for heavy-haul applications.

Explore

https://www.volvotrucks.us/trucks/vhd/

VHD Series – Vocational

Serious off-highway capability and premium on-highway features are combined in our versatile vocational performer, the VHD. The VHD has the brawn required for vocational hauling and the brains to minimize operating costs.

Explore

https://www.volvotrucks.us/trucks/vah/

VAH Series – Auto Hauler

A smooth comfortable ride and superior noise suppression are just a couple of the premium VAH features designed to enhance driver productivity. A clean top-of-frame behind the cab expedites body mounting and eases trailer hookup.

Explore

https://www.volvotrucks.us/trucks/powertrain/d13/

Volvo D13 Engine

The Volvo D13 delivers the perfect combination of fuel efficiency and power for a wide range of applications, and the reliability your customers demand.

Learn More

https://www.volvotrucks.us/trucks/powertrain/d13tc/

Volvo D13TC Engine

Regardless of whether the trailer is fully or partially loaded, an aerodynamic VNL can provide substantial savings. Now standard, our next generation Turbo Compound is up to 6% more fuel efficient than our current 2020 D13 engine.

Learn More

https://main--vg-volvotrucks-us--hlxsites.hlx.page/trucks/powertrain/cummins-x15/

Cummins X15 Engine

The X15 at the 400–550 hp rating is well suited for fleets in freight applications that require fuel economy and the benefits of bigger block architecture.

Learn More

https://main--vg-volvotrucks-us--hlxsites.hlx.page/trucks/powertrain/i-shift-transmission/

I-Shift transmission

We took the industry’s most advanced automated manual transmission and made it better.

Learn More

Your Local Business Partner

Our world-class dealer network with more than 430 locations means your trucks are never far from the quality care and maintenance you expect when you buy a Volvo truck.

Find A Dealer
